hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Long time watcher, first time player. Greetings from Termina. Incentive goes to Randobot's choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.
